HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Reinforced Walls (Continued) initial version.| Refactored, rebalanced, and enhanced the original mod by NECEROS.
- Added an enable/disable settings toggle for embrasures| - Rearranged the mod settings, updated descriptions

Construction skill prerequisite is now set to level 5.| Updated some descriptions in mod settings.| | Added mod settings for the following (disabled by default):| - An option to enable / disable woody stuff as base construction material| - More optional extra construction materials (Devilstrand and Uranium)| - [WD] Reinforced Doors mod integration

Updates to the [WD] Reinforced Doors integration:| - Added a toggle to enable/disable the extra construction materials cost| - Fixed a bug where the extra construction materials were added to the reinforced doors even if the integration toggle was disabled

Added Steel as an extra construction material with configurable options in the mod settings. Also set it as the default extra material instead of Hyperweave, as it was in the original mod. This may require you to adjust the mod settings after update.

Updated for Rimworld 1.6.| - Can now be used in RW 1.5 and 1.6 also without XML Extensions, by dropping support for settings and just using default values| - Added plasteel as an optional extra construction material in settings| - Added a new buffed version of the security door if you have the Anomaly DLC enabled
- Refactored the addition of the reinforced security door via patches.| - Added a toggle to enable/disable the reinforced security door in the mod settings.
- Added a patch to make [WD] Reinforced Doors airtight.| - Updated dds texture files.
